subtests.name: Constructing a CSSLab with percent for the lightness works as intended.
CSSLab.l can be updated with a percent.
Constructing a CSSLab with number for the lightness works as intended.
CSSLab.l can be updated with a number.
Constructing a CSSLab with css pixels for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
Constructing a CSSLab with degrees for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
CSSLab can be constructed from three numbers and will get an alpha of 100%.
CSSLab can be constructed from four numbers.
Constructing a CSSLab with CSS.number for l or alpha throws a SyntaxError
Updating a CSSLab with CSS.number for l throws a SyntaxError
CSSLab.l can be updated to a number.
CSSLab.l can be updated with a CSS percent.
Updating a CSSLab with CSS.number for alpha throws a SyntaxError
CSSLab.alpha can be updated to a number.
CSSLab.alpha can be updated with a CSS percent.
